title: [1.5.2~1.6.4][SSP/SMP][暂停更新]僵尸意识Zombie Awareness v1.9
author: liliangxu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 liliangxu 于 2014-7-3 15:50 编辑 

僵尸意识Zombie Awareness v1.9
Hello大家好我是AL
 今天为大家带来的是僵尸意识MOD
这个MOD引入了一种怪物机制 所以没什么图 见谅
（p.s.服务器坑玩家必备）
介绍
主要特点：
增加了怪物追踪你的方式和范围 也就是说怪物不会傻傻看着你啥也不做的
主要体现在增加了怪物听觉、视觉、嗅觉的机制 
当你在挖矿的时候 怪物会听到声音来找你
当你在怪物发现你的光亮 怪物会直勾勾过来找你
当你被打流血一地大姨妈时 怪物会闻着味儿过来抓你=。=总之丧心病狂就对了-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
嗅觉意识：
当你受伤时 你会溅出一地的血（大姨妈还是节操- -） 并且在你行走中会持续洒落
当你血量低或者饥饿时 每个一段时间你也会洒落一地血
此时 怪物会闻着血迹一路跟随你 直到找到你或者血迹中断-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
视觉意识：
僵尸可以从超远的距离感受到光源 
如果他可以看到并且可以走过来的话他就会飘过来检查一下有木有吃的（别看别人就是你- -）
当你在黑暗的矿洞中插火把挖矿时小心有无数的小眼睛正看着你的火把往你这儿溜达{:10_492:}-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
听觉意识：
怪物可以感觉到声音 比如你敲锤子的声音
当你在挖矿时你的敲击声会刺激周围一定范围内的怪物
被刺激了还愣着干嘛- -溜达过来看看呗-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
其它：
除了以上三种意识 本MOD还为怪物增加了一些其他功能
1、抱团功能
你以为怪都是LOL战斗力只有5的渣么 人GANK玩家从来都是抱团的
如果一个怪物发现你往你身边溜达时 沿途的怪物有可能加入他的团队一起朝你溜达- -
在这个没有眼的世界里。。阿门-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
2、夜间刷怪模式
本MOD完全增强了游戏自带的刷怪模式 主要是针对夜间
夜间怪物的增加会有明显的提高 具体的增加数量可由玩家或服务器自行调节-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3、召唤功能
僵尸的吼声有可能会吸引更多的僵尸。。呃- -召唤嘛-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4、BUFF功能
作者觉得怪物还是不够强。。所以
怪物有可能透视 忽略物块查找你的位置（可自行开关）
怪物有一定几率会提高移动速度 得到一个加速BUFF-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
5、寻路AI和超级追杀模式
这个功能。。呃 
总之就是MOD允许怪物自行寻找最佳路线到玩家的位置
而且这个线路是无线距离的
也就是说如果你被怪物盯上或者开启了超级追杀模式
无论怪物走多远如何走 一定要找到你=。=（不过距离貌似可以调- -）-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
配置文件
这么变态的MOD不一定适用于所有玩家 毕竟大家的接受程度不同 所以大家可以在配置文件中更改
（服务器想坑杀的话自行更改）
general {
B:awareness_Light=true 怪物感知光线：朝光亮移动
B:awareness_Scent=true 怪物感知血迹：朝血迹移动
B:awareness_Sound=true 怪物感知声响：朝声响移动：
I:frequentSoundThreshold=1000 引起怪物注意的连续敲击时间
I:maxPFRange=64 寻路AI的最大距离
I:maxZombiesNight=50 夜间最大僵尸数量
B:noisyPistons=true 活塞声响是否吸引怪物
B:noisyZombies=true 僵尸的叫声是否吸引怪物
B:omnipotent=false 超级追杀模式
I:scentStrength=60 血迹吸引距离
B:seeThroughWalls=false 怪物透视
I:sightRange=16 视线吸引距离
I:soundStrength=60 声音吸引距离
B:wanderingHordes=true 怪物是否抱团
I:zombieRandSpeedBoost=5 加速BUFF速度
I:zombieSpawnTickDelay=40 刷新延迟
}----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

安装方法

将本帖中压缩包下载后解压缩将其中的三个ZIP压缩包“ConfigMod for MC v1.6.2.zip” "CoroAI for MC v1.6.2.zip" 和“Zombie Awareness v1.9 Mod for MC v1.6.2.zip” 放入MODS文件夹中 配置文件在config文件夹中----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

下载地址

(v1.9 for 1.6.4需要FORGE9.10.0830+支持) http://pan.baidu.com/s/1mg0UEtM（之前貌似传错了。。呃）
(v1.9 for 1.6.2需要FORGE9.10.0830+支持) http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=355083056&uk=67260153(v1.9 for 1.5.2需要FORGE支持) http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=4231489906&uk=67260153 

更新日志New in v1.9:
New Features------------
- A pile of new configurations added, a bit of a mess at the moment, to be resolved once new feature reorganization happens- Old extra spawning via 'maxZombiesNight' still exists, but 2 new per player only spawning ways exist:-- Surface spawning: will spawn zombies from nothing randomlyish around you on the topmosts blocks at night (might violate some spawn rules, carefull)-- Cave spawning: depends on existing zombies, will duplicate a new zombie like the old 'maxZombiesNight' but is for caves, more event based, intelligent cave spawning systems will become preset in Hostile Worlds and this feature will remain random-- Lots of ways to configure it, see the standard /config command way-- Also has an option to make them 1 time auto target the player they're spawning near without needing omnipotence on all the time
- Ability to switch to csv list of Entities, as well as a way to switch the list between whitelist and backlist, use the the console debugs to see if your list is properly ticking on the entities you want, /za list helps you see the naming you need to use, this should help enable use of ZA on mod entities more, if they use vanilla path following ways
- New 'per player' based configuring option have been added in an attempt to make it more customizable for servers but requires admin to config:-- Senses (sound, blood) -- New extra surface spawning-- New extra cave spawning
- Client side only configs: render blood, show debug visual of senses in world (shows their strength in size too)- A bunch of other small improvements I've forgotten
- Future planI don't like that I have to adjust the settings of ZA to more intense as I progress in the game, theres a flow issue..... So I'm going to take my player rating calculating code from Hostile Worlds and add it to ZA to dynamically update the 'difficulty' of ZA around you, and a way to the client player to tell the server they want features on like extra spawning (some really hate that stuff entirely)Hopefully this will make ZA only a little active when you are just starting out, and as you get awesome armor etc, ZA updates the challenge appropriately in its passive non event based way of doing its stuffNo ETA on when I'll do this, basically when the right kind of motivation hits me
New in v1.85:
New Features:- Zombies get a slight randomized speed buff (configurable)- Added option for surface zombie spawn delay- Ops can change any config ingame with /za command (restores config file setting on restart)
Bug fixes:- Fixed random blood showing up- Removed limit on max scents, random chance and max spawn time of 1 minute keeps the total amount of them down.- Fixed concurrent modification exceptions for good, CoroAI pathfinding uses a maintained world cache now- Lots of self correcting fixes added to CoroAI PFQueue for better long term dedicated server functionality
New in 1.8:
- New light awareness, will spot exposed light sources near players (configurable)- Adds around 10-20 more zombies to the surface at night (configurable)
New in v1.7:
- Chance for hostiles to gather around other zombies (1/40)- Chance for hostiles to hear piston noises (1/40)- Wandering hordes is default on for those with no config yet

最后上一张血迹图吧






QQ图片20130831213250.jpg (15.43 KB, 下载次数: 311)

下载附件

2013-8-31 21:35 上传






再次强调 本MOD只是增加机制 并没有一些物品等增加 所以没有什么图 请见谅 有任何问题都可以在本帖提出 MOD自身问题也可提出 我会向作者反应

最后求回复求关注~~{:10_492:}

replies.author: liliangxu
replies.txt_content:
lufeisilaodou 发表于 2013-9-2 02:33 
亲,我想知道,修改配置文件是修改服务器端的还是客户端的吖?求教学
如果你是服务器菌你就改服务器里config里的设置 此时玩家客户端的设置将失效 如果你是自己玩就修改自己客户端的config里的设置即可

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content:
LZ，本人发现了一个翻译问题：
配置文件里的 frequentSoundThreshold 的意思是连续多少时间的挖矿/敲击声音会引起注意，而不是最低频率（就看着三个词有点难明白这我懂，翻译错了可以理解），单位为ms毫秒，1000即为连续产生噪声1秒会引起怪物注意，请尽快修正。
